short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a command to translate texts from a given language to a given language fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension make easier the way you translate some word. Have you ever suddenly have the need to translate a specific word? Now you don't need to go to a new tab, just Alt+T and translate it.
